Title: Allows college coursework to be credited as a work activity which may be used toward fulfilling the employment requirements for public assistance benefits
Summary: Allows college coursework to be credited as a work activity which may be used toward fulfilling the employment requirements for public assistance benefits under certain conditions.
LawCode: Amd ยง336-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to access to a college education by public assistance recipients who are subject to work participation requirements
